aboutAuthor.message: This extension was written by Glenn Nelson. You can also follow him on Twitter @67726e.

aboutExtension.message: Header-Editor is a Chrome extension that allows you to easily insert HTTP headers into your requests.

aboutSupport.message: For questions, issues, or feature requests, please see the Header-Editor GitHub repository.
